txt.en: Bâdarul fears that Ekhamâti soldiers have escaped the fighting and made their way into the area. They are now looting and causing chaos and must be stopped.
Return to Bâdarul in Iridír and inform him that you have successfully dealt with the looters causing trouble in the area.
Bâdarul fears that Ekhamâti soldiers have escaped the fighting and made their way into the area. They are now looting and causing chaos and must be stopped.

'Greetings, [placeholder]. I am glad you are here. I am in need of your help.\n\n'There have been reports of looting and sightings of citizens acting suspiciously in the area. I believe these \qcitizens\q are Ekhamâti soldiers in disguise here to cause chaos. See if you can identify these individuals and put a stop to them before they cause any more damage.'

'You have returned. Were you able to find any of these troublemakers?'

You inform Bâdarul of the looters you defeated.

'So it was Ekhamâti soldiers after all. I am glad you have dealt with them and given us one less issue to manage here.'
